about_the_game:
FIGHT ALIENS. RESCUE HOSTAGES. SAVE EARTH.


Earth is on the verge of takeover by aliens intent on turning humans into mindless zombies to use in their conquest of the universe. Harry must blow away zombies, rescue hostages and penetrate the alien mother ship that has attached itself to the Big Corp skyscraper.

In addition to his flamethrower and photon cannon, Harry is accompanied by his Drone that wields an arsenal of deadly weapons like the plasma gun, pulse rifle and micro-nukes. It’s an arsenal that will have the aliens shaking in their slimy shoes.

Harry’s adventure will take him across New York City through sewers, office buildings and finally inside the alien mothership.

KEY FEATURES

* Multiple weapons including pulse rifles plasma guns and micro-nukes
* Large arenas to fight in, traversing multiple locations types including sewers, office blocks and alien ships
* Upgradeable Drone with weapons of mass destruction
* Cool 50's inspired monsters and aliens fused with James Cameron style military tech
* A brand new adventure that takes inspiration from the original 90's shareware hit, Alien Carnage / Halloween Harry

ABOUT THE DEVELOPERS

Halloween Harry is made by just two developers, John and Pete. We've been making games for ages - you may even know some of the games we've worked on such as TY the Tasmanian Tiger, Destroy All Humans 2 and of course the original Halloween Harry / Alien Carnage!

We've had a blast making this new Harry game and hope you have fun playing it!

short_description: Halloween Harry is a 3rd person action game. Upgrade your drone to deal damage to enemies as you work your way through New York City sewers, office buildings and alien ships to reach the Alien Supreme Leader and stop the invasion.
